happy_paths.name: Inquiry to Successful Account Setup
steps: Agent explains the product, rules, and deposit minimums.
Customer completes registration and document verification.
Agent guides customer to amplify the account (x12) and connect to MT5.
Customer confirms the account is active and ready for trading.

happy_paths.name: Successful Information Request
steps: Customer inquires about the leveraged accounts.
Agent provides detailed information about the product.
Customer asks clarifying questions about rules, withdrawals, and company details.
Customer is satisfied with the information and expresses intent to proceed at a later time.

deviations.name: Registration & Login Issues
deviations.description: Customer is unable to register, complete document verification (KYC), or log in to the client portal after creating an account.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'No me deja entrar', 'error al registrarme', 'La aplicación me saca', or 'no he podido iniciar seccion'.

deviations.name: Deposit & Withdrawal Problems
deviations.description: Customer reports that a deposit is not reflecting in their wallet or a withdrawal is delayed. This typically requires escalation to the support team.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'mi depósito no aparece', 'hice el retiro y no ha cargado', or 'aún no se ve reflejado el saldo'.

deviations.name: Post-Setup Trading Issues
deviations.description: After successfully setting up the account, the customer is unable to place trades on MT5 or has questions about platform specifics like server names or asset tickers.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'no me deja operar', 'no me aparece el servidor', or asks why asset tickers need a '.f' suffix.

deviations.name: Wrong Number / Unrelated Inquiry
deviations.description: The customer contacts the business number by mistake, believing it to be a personal contact, or sends spam/abusive messages.
deviations.trigger: Messages are personal ('Q mas perro'), nonsensical, contain spam links, or the agent responds with 'Estas equivocado'.

deviations.name: Inexperienced User
deviations.description: Customer reveals they have little or no trading experience. The agent identifies that the product is for experienced users and pivots to offering educational resources or an academy.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'No tengo experiencia', 'voy empezando', or 'no se mucho del tema'.
